column5: Travelling to Ontario from Montana for the annual walleye fix in late June. We have a cooler with about 50 pounds of frozen elk meat that is being taken to Wisconsin AFTER the canadian walleye trip ends. I need to find a place to leave the frozen meat for a week on the US side of the border while we are in camp. Need to drop it off on a thursday evening, and pick it up the following friday afternoon as we head south.Anyone have any good leads (name and or phone number) on a meat processor or locker plant that would rent out some freezer space for a week in or near international falls?
I would google "butcher shops or meat processing in Int Falls"..has to be a few with all the deer hunting done up there..
1-800-FALLSMN thats the chamber of commerce. They should be able to help.
You might try here: Sportsman's Service. 430 3rd Avenue. International Falls, Minnesota. 56649. ph: (218) 283-2411
Thanks for the hints. It looks like Sportsmans Service will work out just fine for us. I appreciate the help!
Tim will take care of you and they have anything you might need for tackle before your Ontario fix. Have a great trip.
